statements: SELECT * FROM RefereeData;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM RefereeData WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM RefereeData ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM RefereeData WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM RefereeData WHERE match_assignment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM RefereeData WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM RefereeData WHERE match_assignment > 5 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT referee_id, email FROM RefereeData WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM RefereeData WHERE last_name IN ('Smith', 'Johnson', 'Williams') LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT match_assignment) AS total_assignments, COUNT(*) AS total_referees FROM RefereeData;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT name, email FROM referees WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM referees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, match_date FROM match_assignments ORDER BY match_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC, referee_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM match_assignments WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Stadium' ORDER BY match_date ASC, assignment_id DESC
SELECT referee_id, name, email FROM referees WHERE phone_number IS NULL
SELECT referee_id, name, email, phone_number FROM referees WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT assignment_id, match_date, location FROM match_assignments WHERE location IN ('Field', 'Indoor')
SELECT * FROM Referees;
SELECT name, email FROM Referees WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT referee_id, match_id, assignment_date FROM Assignments WHERE referee_id = 2;
SELECT count(*) AS total_assignments FROM Assignments;
SELECT * FROM Referees;
SELECT name, email FROM Referees WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT Matches.match_date, Referees.name FROM Matches INNER JOIN Referees ON Matches.referee_id = Referees.referee_id;

SELECT Assignments.assignment_id, Matches.stadium, Referees.phone_number FROM Assignments INNER JOIN Matches ON Assignments.match_id = Matches.match_id INNER JOIN Referees ON Assignments.referee_id = Referees.referee_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches, MAX(Matches.match_date) AS latest_match_date FROM Matches;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT name, email FROM referees;
SELECT id, name, phone FROM referees;
SELECT city, state FROM contact_info;
SELECT match_date, match_location FROM match_assignments;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT id, name, email FROM referees WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT r.name, ci.address, ci.city, ci.country FROM referees r JOIN contact_info ci ON r.id = ci.referee_id ORDER BY ci.city, r.name;
SELECT ma.match_date, ma.match_location, r.name AS referee_name FROM match_assignments ma JOIN referees r ON ma.referee_id = r.id WHERE ma.match_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT ah.assignment_date, r.name AS referee_name, ma.match_location FROM assignments_history ah JOIN referees r ON ah.referee_id = r.id JOIN match_assignments ma ON ah.match_id = ma.id WHERE ah.assignment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY ah.assignment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM referees WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT match_id, team1, team2, match_date, stadium FROM matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT referee_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM referees WHERE phone_number != '' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT match_id, match_date, stadium, team1, team2 FROM matches WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT referee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM referees WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT match_date, stadium, team1, team2 FROM matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, assigned_date, match_details, first_name, last_name FROM match_assignments JOIN referees ON match_assignments.referee_id = referees.referee_id;
SELECT referee_id, city, country FROM contact_information WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, referee_id FROM performance_ratings GROUP BY referee_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
